radiographic_examinations.findings: Large patent ductus arteriosus, mild pericardial effusion, severe left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH), moderate-to-severe subaortic stenosis, normal aortic valve, presence of a subaortic membrane.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Peak pressure gradient reduced from 70 mm Hg to 51 mm Hg; mean pressure gradient reduced from 45 mm Hg to 32 mm Hg.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Subaortic membrane, moderate aortic stenosis, moderate LVH.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Peak pressure gradient reduced from 90 mm Hg to 72 mm Hg post-surgery.
